overview:
Franz Buchenberger is a serial entrepreneur, international executive and business angel. He is involved both in consumer and enterprise businesses, usually with a strong emphasis on international growth.

Franz was co-founder and CEO of two Internet companies, blaxxun interactive and Foroso Communications. He is currently in preparation for another startup, and advices some founder teams in their early stage (including seed investments as business angel).

blaxxun interactive was was the leader for 3D Virtual Worlds and was funded by CMGI@Ventures, General Electric and others. Foroso Communications provided online collaboration SaaS and was acquired by World TV in 2004.

Franz also acted for 10 years as executive for Softlab/BMW and Fujitsu, where he directed major software product initatives with development and business responsibilities.
